title: The Antiquary - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: It's about our back-yard--ye'll maybe hae heardof it in the Parliament-house, Hutchison against Mackitchinson--it's aweel-kenn'd plea--its been four times in afore the fifteen, and deil onything the wisest o' them could make o't, but just to send it out againto the outer-house.--O it's a beautiful thing to see how lang and howcarefully justice is considered in this country!"

title: The Antiquary - Volume 01
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: It's about our back-yardye'll maybe hae heardof it in the Parliament-house, Hutchison against Mackitchinsonit's aweel-kenn'd pleaits been four times in afore the fifteen, and deil onything the wisest o' them could make o't, but just to send it out againto the outer-house.O it's a beautiful thing to see how lang and howcarefully justice is considered in this country!"

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Among the many eminent names which adorn its annals, and have shod a lustre over the literary and civil history of Scotland, may be mentioned  Melville, Baillie, Leishman, Burnet, Simpson, Hutchison,  Black, Cullen, Adam Smith, Reid, Miller, Richardson, Young, the first Greek scholar of his day, and Sandford, also eminent as a Greek scholar and orator.

title: Travels in lands beyond the sea.
author: Linskill, Charles Dorrance.
snippet: Passing along the streets of Glasgow, I saw so many familiar names that I wrote down a few as follows:  Weir, McCulloch, Graham, MacFarlane, Hutchison, Dick, Kerr, French, Grant, Gilchrist, Cameron, Ferguson, Easton, Stuart, Taggart, Ma- chell, Campbell, Black, Hillard, Wilson, Buchannan, Allen, etc.

title: Travels in Lands beyond the Sea. Beauty and Glory of Western Europe, etc
author: Linskill, Charles D.
snippet: Passing along the streets of Glasgow, I saw somany familiar names that I wrote down a few as follows: Weir, McCulloch, Graham, MacFarlane,Hutchison, Dick, Kerr, French, Grant, Gilchrist,Cameron, Ferguson, Easton, Stuart, Taggart, Machell, Campbell, Black, Hillard, Wilson, Buchannan,Allen, etc.
